job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: stronguWhat You Will Be Doingbrustrongul liResponsible for working with users and Product Managers to address customer needs by formulating machine learning and artificial intelligence solutionsli liUtilize software engineering and data science skills to collaborate with UXUI teammates on the usability of datadriven product features and assess needs and solutions for largescale data infrastructureli liDrive the technical delivery of dataset creation experimentation prototyping implementation testing deployment monitoring and continuous improvementli liApplication of machine learning technologies to novel problems in the domains of software operations and securityli liRequire the customization of machine learning models in order to generate useful insights across heterogeneous customer datasets as well as the design and implementation of production software services to deploy and deliver these models to the customers andli liOwn the uptime and reliability of machine learningrelated services and capabilitiesli brbrulstronguRequirementsbrbrustrongstrongWhat we need from youbrbrstrongMasters degree or foreign equivalent in Computer Science Computer Engineering Information Technology or a related field and two 2 years of experience as a Machine Learning Engineer Software Engineer or in a related rolebrul liWork experience withli liObjectoriented programming experience in Java Scala Ruby or Cli liMachine learningstatisticsli liSoftware engineering of productiongrade servicesli liSoftware data related to operations and security andli liValidate Machine Learning models on different platformsliul
